alert.note: Alert for Butts; Clayton; Henry; Newton; Rockdale; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 6:16PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Spalding, southern Rockdale, Henry, north central Butts, central Clayton and southwestern Newton Counties through 645 PM EST... At 616 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Lovejoy to near Atlanta Motor Speedway to Hampton to Birdie, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McDonough, Conyers, Jonesboro, Stockbridge, Hampton, Morrow, Lovejoy, Locust Grove, Porterdale, Jenkinsburg, Sunny Side, Stewart, Lake Spivey, Blacksville, Ola, Worthville, Luella, Flippen, Fincherville and Kelleytown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for central, north central and west central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Butts; Clayton; Henry; Newton; Rockdale; Spalding
